entrypoints.name: succinct-noir-demo
entrypoints.buildCommand: mkdir -p build && cd circuits && nargo check && nargo build && nargo codegen-verifier && cd .. && tar -czvf build/circuits.tar.gz circuits && cp circuits/contract/circuits/plonk_vk.sol build/FunctionVerifier.sol
entrypoints.proveCommand: ./convert_input.sh && cd build && tar -xzvf circuits.tar.gz && cd circuits && cp ../../Prover.toml Prover.toml && nargo prove | ../../convert_output.sh && cp output.json ../../output.json && cd ../..
